name: KayaKING
description:
KayaKING is simple and fun to play, but steering your kayak boat through the river isn't an easy task. Only the best players can call themselves Kings and Queens of the Kayak or, as we say, the KayaKING! 👑

In this kayak game you need to be fast and precise to collect all time bonuses and avoid crashing with dangerous rocks inside the water.

Tap one side of the screen to steer your kayak boat and hold one side to use your paddle as an anchor/brake.

The farther you paddle your kayak harder the challenges will become!

Share your experience in this addicting brand new kayak boat game in the reviews o/ 🚣

Game Features:
- Innovative mechanics
- Simple controls
- Different kayak skins
- Personal & Global high score
- Infinite gameplay
- Free to play (With ads)
